name: market for soybean | soybean | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/20165/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'soybean', in the geography of Brazil.;This is dataset represents the transport of 1 kg of soybeans from the production farm to the plant producting soybean meal and soybean oil. No losses are considered in this dataset.;The product 'soybean' is a seed. It is an annual crop. The ecoinvent database also contains this product from organic and Swiss integrated production.

The activity starts at the gate of soybean cultivation farm.

The activity ends with the provision of soybean grains to the soybean meal and oil production plant.
category: A:Agriculture, forestry and fishing/01:Crop and animal production, hunting and related service activities/011:Growing of non-perennial crops/0111:Growing of cereals (except rice), leguminous crops and oil seeds

processDocumentation.technologyDescription: The data are intended to reflect current equipment and processes on a Brazilian level.

flow.name: soybean
flow.category: A:Agriculture, forestry and fishing/01:Crop and animal production, hunting and related service activities/011:Growing of non-perennial crops/0111:Growing of cereals (except rice), leguminous crops and oil seeds

exchanges.description:
Weighted average distance for transport of soybean in grains between the cultivation areas and oil extraction mills: 440 km. 

Reference: GARCILASSO, V.P. Análise entre processos e matérias-primas para a produção de biodiesel. Tese. Doutorado em Ciências - Universidade de São Paulo. São Paulo, 2014. 373 pg.
